Package nano.remexp.client.modules

Interface Summary
GUIModule GUI modules can be placed in GUI layouts. they show specific behaviour for certain commands or informations received by the server.
 

Class Summary
GMAdminCommands A GUI module that holds an input text field for the administrator commands.
GMBasicButtons A GUI module that holds the baic control buttons for the remote experiment.
GMBoxSamples A GUI module that holds the sample combo box for the client to choose from.
GMBoxScanRanges A GUI module that holds a combo box for the client to choose scan ranges.
GMButtonCamAngle A GUI module that holds one button to choose the camera angle of the built in remote experiment camera.
GMButtonLogin A GUI module that holds the login button.
GMButtonSave A GUI module that holds the login button.
GMInfoLine A GUI module that holds the info line which displays informations to the clients.
GMLabelSamples A GUI module that holds the sample combo box for the client to choose from.
GMLabelScanRanges A GUI module that holds a label that displays the scan range.
GMMovementArrows A GUI module that holds the movement arrows for movements on the sample.
GMProgressBar A GUI module that holds a progress bar for the reflection of the scan state during measurements.
GMStatusBar A GUI module that holds status information about the connectivity and the remote experiment state.
